definition: Vow made, usually because of moral or religious beliefs, to abstain from sexual relations.
details:
noun
- Vow made, usually because of moral or religious beliefs, to abstain from sexual relations.
= example: Vow made, usually because of moral or religious beliefs, to abstain from sexual relations.
= synonyms: celibacy, sexual abstention
- morality with respect to sexual relations
= synonyms: virtue, sexual morality
